verses.text: How long wilt thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*? how long wilt thou \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from me?\f + \fr 13.1 \ft chiefâ€¦: or, overseer\f*

How long shall I \w take|strong="H7896"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* in my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \add having\add* \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w* in my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w daily|strong="H3119"\w*? how long shall mine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* over me?

\w Consider|strong="H5027"\w* \add and\add* \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w lighten|strong="H0215"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, lest I \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w* the \add sleep of\add* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*;

Lest mine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w prevailed|strong="H3201"\w* against him; \add and\add* those that \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w* me \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* when I am \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.
But I have \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*; my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* in thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.
I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, because he hath dealt \w bountifully|strong="H1580"\w* with me.
